#Downloading and Compiling the Source Code

= Dependancies =

OpenFlux has dependancies on two other open source libraries, Degrafa and Tweener.

== Degrafa ==

Degrafa is a declaative graphics language targeting Flex. OpenFlux uses Degrafa to render complex graphics. Degrafa source is available on google code at http://degrafa.googlecode.com/ under the MIT license.

== Tweener ==

Tweener is a popular flash tweening and animation library. Although OpenFlux was made to use any animation package , it provides a default implementation using Tweener.
